title: Bind a New Life Insurance Policy
description: An applicant has been approved and has paid their first premium. The agent needs to officially bind the policy.

tasks.description: Confirm receipt of the initial premium payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies that the first payment has been successfully processed.

tasks.description: Confirm all delivery requirements have been met (e.g., signed policy delivery receipt).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms all paperwork is complete.

tasks.description: Change the policy status from 'Approved' to 'In Force'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully issues the policy, making it active.
